TopicTitle: Shutoff Tank valves by action group

Articles.Content:
It's probably already been suggested but anyone else think it would be good if you could control groups of tank shutoff valves by action group rather than lots and lots of right-clicking? Useful when using docking ports to build craft in orbit, then finding out your lander doesn't have any fuel left half way through descent!

Just something I'd find useful.

Thoughts?

Yes this would also come in handy with spaceplanes/SSTOs.

All these cross fuel drain from everywhere because I'm a airbreathing engine stuff is making it really displeasing to build them.

Yes, yes, yes, a thousand times yes. I've wanted this for several reasons:

- Making a rocket drain bottom to top for better stability.

- Enabling/disabling multiple tanks simultaneously during a burn.

- Enabling/disabling tanks that are clipped or otherwise hidden.

Action groups on fuel tanks? Enable/disable and feed-in/out?

Yes please!

I do have some large SSTOs where I would need to be able to switch on and off a lot of fuel tanks at once, to keep it in balance during ascend.

Turning off the engines and switch all fuel tanks manually, would take so long that I don't reach orbit, because I loose to much speed.
Tweakable Everything has you covered.
